body:
Well, I'm certainly not new to Avicus, but this is my first time actually getting around to creating an account on the forums. I'm not quite sure what to say. I'm American, always have been. I've moved around a lot but I currently live in New York state. I don't take the competitive gamemodes too seriously at times but I really would like to improve and be better at them. I've known and played Minecraft since a few months after it came out which is crazy. Also, I'm a guy and my IGN is a reference to the Redwall series and Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy. I'm 16.

Anyways, I've had a lot of fun these past five months on Avicus and I hope to continue that for some time! Thanks for reading.

title: Hey guys

replies.body:
Hey!

Nice to see you getting involved in the community forums :) You'll see a lot of cool stuff but sometimes trash stuff as well.

replies.body: Hello o/, welcome to the forums. I'm pretty sure you'll like it here xD.

replies.body:
Welcome to the forums!

If you have any questions a staff member would be glad to help. Also you should check out the Community Slack if you want to interact even more. Hope you enjoy your time here! :D
